title: Ping spikes,not from my ISP
body: Guys please help me ive tried everything from re-installing pc,removing router(playing directly from modem), i even called a technician to check if everything is ok with my connection and he sayed it's at its best.Yet i only have ping spikes playing league of legends, it goes randomly up to 200-250 and sometimes it just goes stable 40 for a few minutes before spiking up again.I sometimes talk with my friends and they hear me all right and vice versa when i get those ping spikes they usually last for 10 s in which i can perfectly communicate through skype with my friends.The games Before the ping became spiking up had some Attempting to reconnect moments where i completely froze but yet Net was still up and working, now that they are gone i get those ping spikes,please help guys, please.I am from Bulgaria if thats from any use

replies.body: Your internet can work fine with other services, but still run into issues reaching specific servers.  Recently, some EUNE players have had ISP issues in Bulgaria and surrounding regions while routing to the game server.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can work with you directly to figure out what's going on.
